name: Braggart
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: If they are a Minion and more than 4 players live, you are both executed.

name: Cartwright
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Cartwright and have them choose another player, then if there are any drunk or poisoned players between themselves and the chosen player, indicate a yes. Otherwise, indicate a no.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Cartwright and have them choose another player, then if there are any drunk or poisoned players between themselves and the chosen player, indicate a yes. Otherwise, indicate a no.
ability: Each night, choose an alive player (not yourself); you learn if there are any drunk or poisoned players between you on a shortest route.

name: Chronicler
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Chronicler and indicate either 1, 2, 1&2 or 3, depending on which corresponds to the latest executee
ability: Each night* you learn the number(s) that corresponded to the latest executee; 1) Drunk/Poisoned 2) Outsider 3) Neither.

name: Herald
ability: Each day*, you may visit the storyteller to learn a true statement about the player you nominated yesterday.

name: Jeweler
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Jeweler and have them indicate if they want to use their ability. If they do, indicate 2 players that has at least 1 living evil player seated between them. Then put the Used token on the Jeweler.
otherNightReminder: If they don't have a Used reminder token on them, Wake up the Jeweler and have them indicate if they want to use their ability. If they do, indicate 2 players that has at least 1 living evil player seated between them. Then put the Used token on the Jeweler.
ability: Once per game at night you may choose to learn 2 players which have at least 1 living, evil player seated between them.

name: Palace Guard
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Palace Guard and have them choose either clockwise or counter-clockwise. Then show them a token of a character seated closer to them in that direction than the other.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Palace Guard and show them a character token of a character seated further in the initially chosen direction than the character shown last night.
ability: You start by choosing a direction, even if drunk or poisoned. Each night, learn a character of a player further in that direction than last night's character.

name: Poet
firstNightReminder: Have the Poet pick 3 other players, then put them back to sleep.
ability: On your first night, choose three other players. Each day you may privately ask the Storyteller for a true statement relating to the chosen players.

name: Rascal
firstNightReminder: Put the Neighbor reminder tokens on the players neighboring the Rascal. Wake up the Rascal, show them a character type that corresponds to either of the players with Neighbor tokens. Then move the Neighbor reminder tokens one step away from the Rascal.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Rascal, show them a character type that corresponds to either of the players with Neighbor tokens. Then move the Neighbor reminder tokens one step away from the Rascal.
ability: Each night, you learn the character type of a neighbor, then you consider your neighbors to be one step further.

name: Ratcatcher
ability: Outsiders that you nominate are drunk until dawn. Executed Outsiders learn who you are. [+1 Outsider]

name: Serf
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Serf and have them choose another player, then indicate the number of steps from the choosen player to the Outsider seated closest to them.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Serf and have them choose another player, then indicate the number of steps from the choosen player to the Outsider seated closest to them.
ability: Each night, choose another player; you learn how many steps from them to the closest Outsider. [At least 1 Outsider]

name: Shepherd
ability: Each day you may visit the Storyteller and choose a past Night Phase; learn one thing that happened during that night phase.

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Stargazer and either show a out-of-play Outsider token or single a no and put them back to sleep.
name: Stargazer
ability: You start knowing one not-in-play Outsider, or if there are none. [-1 Outsider]
flavor: Despite the curfew, they found the night sky is irresistible.

name: Treasurer
firstNightReminder: Show the Treasurer 2 Minion tokens, one which is in play and one which is not, or signal a no, then put them back to sleep.
ability: You start the game knowing two Minions; one that is in play and one that is not.(Or that zero are in play)
flavor: You donâ€™t have to be an alchemist to turn ink into gold.

name: Hellion
ability: One more vote is secretly needed to mark players for execution. You keep this ability when killed by the demon.

name: Lamplighter
otherNightReminder: If the Lamplighter nominated today, wake up each evil player in any order and have them choose a player; they learn the player they chose's character.
ability: Each night*, if you nominated today, each evil player chooses a player; they learn the chosen playersâ€™ character.

name: Quack
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Quack and have them choose clockwise or counter-clockwise. Put the Drunk reminder token on the closest good player seated in the chosen direction.
otherNightReminder: If alive, move the Drunk reminder token to the next good player seated in the chosen direction.
ability: You start choosing a direction; your closest good neighbor in that direction is Drunk, even if dead. Each night*, the drunkenness moves to the next good player in the chosen direction.

name: Stalker
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Stalker and have them choose a player; put a Stalked reminder token on that player.
otherNightReminder: Remove any Stalked reminder tokens from players. Wake up the Stalker and have them choose a player; put a Stalked reminder token on that player.
ability: Each night, choose another living player: Until dusk, any ability that interacts with them might interact with you instead. [+0 to +1 Stalker]

name: Chindi
ability: When you learn that you have died you may publicly choose 3 living players; 1 becomes Evil tonight.

name: Maggot
ability: On your first night, all Townsfolk characters are poisoned until Dusk. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

name: Troglodyte
ability: You start knowing one not-in-play Outsider; you have their ability. You might register as an Outsider.

name: Wight
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Wight and have them choose a player. Put the Haunted reminder token on the chosen player.
otherNightReminder: If the player with the Haunted reminder token on them was executed yesterday and; if the Wight is alive, put the Dead reminder token on a living player or; if the Wight is dead, put the Returned reminder token on the Wight.
ability: On your first night, choose a living player (not yourself); When they are executed, you are resurrected the following dawn. If you cannot be resurrected, a player dies instead.

name: Carnificina
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Carnificina and have them choose 3 living players. Put a Prey token on each of those players. Put the Aware token on one of those players and wake them up. Show them Carnificina token and the 2 other chosen players.
otherNightReminder: If all players with Prey tokens on them live, put a Dead token on 2 of them. If at least 1 of the players with a Prey token on them is dead, instead put a Dead token on any living player. Then remove all Prey tokens. Wake up the Carnificina and have them choose 3 living players. Put a Prey token on each of those players. Put the Aware token on one of those players and wake them up. Show them Carnificina token and the 2 other chosen players.
ability: Each night, choose 3 living players: One learns the rest. Next night, if all live, two die. Otherwise, a player dies.

name: Linguamori
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Linguamori and have them choose a player. Put the Dead reminder token on that player.
ability: Each night*, choose a player; they die. Dead Evils donâ€™t need a vote token to vote. Ties result in shared marks for death if dead evils voted.

name: Miasmagus
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Miasmagus and have them choose a player. Put the Dead reminder token on the chosen player. Then, if that player is an Outsider, put the Poisoned reminder token on a Townsfolk player
ability: Each night*, choose a player; they die. When an Outsider dies this way, one Townsfolk player is poisoned until the next Outsider dies.[+1 Outsider OR +2 Stalkers]

name: Peregrimor
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Peregrimor and show them each player that is an Outsider. Then wake up each evil Outsider in turn and show them the player that is the Peregrimor.
ability: You know all Outsiders. Evil Outsiders learns who you are. Each night* choose a player; they die. [+1 Minion, All Minions are Evil Outsiders.]

name: Dealbreaker
firstNightReminder: Have the Dealbreaker indicate 1 or 2. If they indicate 1, indicate a drunk/poisoned player or indicate a no if there are none. If they indicate a 2, show them a out-of-play character token.
otherNightReminder: Have the Dealbreaker indicate 1 or 2. If they indicate 1, indicate a drunk/poisoned player or indicate a no if there are none. If they indicate a 2, show them a out-of-play character token.
ability: Each night you may choose to learn either 1) a player that is drunk/poisoned OR; 2) a character that is not in play.

name: Echo
ability: Each day, you may only repeat words that the Storyteller has said today, or you might die. If you are dead, once per day you may call for a vote for your resurrection.

name: Last Soul
otherNightReminder: Have the Lost Soul choose a player; publicly announce the player and character.
ability: Each night* you may choose a player (not yourself); their character is announced. If you choose an Evil player the character announced is arbitrary.

name: Scryer
firstNightReminder: Somehow obscure 3/4ths of the Grimoire, then show it to the Scryer.
ability: On your first night you see a quarter of the Grimoire.

name: Tomb Prospector
otherNightReminder: Have the Tomb Prospector choose a player they believe to be alive. Then, if that player is alive, wake them up and indicate a dead player and give them a true statement about that player
ability: Each night*, choose another player; If alive they learn a true statement about a dead player.
